mapper.select: SELECT Appointment_id appointmentId,Open.floor_name floorName,DATE_FORMAT(appointment_time, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分') appointmentTime, DATE_FORMAT(appointments_createTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分') appointmentsCreateTime,Constant.value appointmentsStatus,UserAppointments.seatName seatName FROM UserAppointments INNER JOIN libraryManage.Open ON Open.floor_id=UserAppointments.floor_id INNER JOIN Constant ON appointments_status=coding WHERE UserAppointments.user_id=#{userId}
